name: Create Streamlabs alerts for new Google Sheets rows
description:
Make will watch your Google Sheets rows at regular intervals and create Streamlabs alerts.
Here's the [sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1xWeO2LdJAafcHFVh-yJgqljMeEaAc6sDyWDFHBSlNNQ/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario.
